Generate CSV functions¶

fetch_artifact¶

This function fetches an object or artifact from the Musuem API

generate_csv.fetch_artifact(objectid)¶
Parameters

objectid – objectid for the fetched artifact from the Museum API

Returns

This function returns the artifact fetched from the Museum API for the particular objectid

flatten json¶

To flatten a nested json you can use the generate_csv.flatten()

generate_csv.flatten(artifact)¶
Parameters

artifact – this is the artifact dictionary fetched from the Museum API

Returns

This function returns the flattened JSON from a complex nested JSON recieved from the API response object

convert_row¶

Converts a single row of CSV record to an XML object

generate_csv.convert_row(row1)¶
Parameters

row1 – This is a single record from the CSV file generated from the API data

Returns

This function returns the XML object parsed from a single CSV record
